grf.name: Timberwolf's UK Road Vehicles 2.3.2 (HD)
grf.description: Description:{SILVER}A set of vehicles common in the UK, including trucks and buses. High-definition version with 4x zoom.{}(c) 2016-2020 Matt Kimber. {}{BLACK}License:{SILVER}GPLv2.

parameters.name: 56mph speed limiters
parameters.desc: Vehicles built after 1991 will have a mandatory 56mph/90kmh speed limiter fitted (62mph/100kmh for buses).

parameters.name: Cars and vans obey national speed limit
parameters.desc: Cars and vans obey the 70mph UK national speed limit.

parameters.name: Realistic early vehicle statistics
parameters.desc: Prefer realism over gameplay for pre-1940s vehicles. {}{RED}Warning!{BLACK} This will significantly increase difficulty levels in the early game.

parameters.name: Realistic modern vehicle capacity
parameters.desc: Prefer realistic capacities over gameplay for post-1940s vehicles.

parameters.name: Smoke effects
parameters.desc: Whether vehicles should produce steam, diesel smoke and other visual effects.

parameters.name: Purchase Cost Modifier
parameters.desc: Increase or decrease build costs to change difficulty, or balance with other GRF sets. Higher values may be difficult, especially in the early game

parameters.name: Running Cost Modifier
parameters.desc: Increase or decrease running costs to change difficulty, or balance with other GRF sets.  Higher values may be difficult, especially in the early game.

parameters.name: Enable Buses
parameters.desc: Choose whether buses and coaches from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Lorries
parameters.desc: Choose whether large freight vehicles from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Vans
parameters.desc: Choose whether vans and small freight vehicles from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Cars
parameters.desc: Choose whether cabs, minicabs and other small passenger vehicles from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Horse-Drawn Vehicles
parameters.desc: Choose whether horse-drawn wagons and coaches from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Steam Vehicles
parameters.desc: Choose whether early steam-powered vehicles from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Passenger Trams
parameters.desc: Choose whether passenger trams from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Cargo Trams
parameters.desc: Choose whether cargo trams from this set will be available for purchase during the game.

parameters.name: Enable Easter Eggs
parameters.desc: This set includes representations of some of the creator's own vehicles for fun. Use this option to enable or disable them.

parameters.name: Hybrid Tram Purchase Mode
parameters.desc: Choose whether hybrid rail/tram vehicles appear in the tram purchase list, the rail vehicle purchase list, both, or neither.

parameters.name: Light Rail Purchase Mode
parameters.desc: Choose whether light rail vehicles appear in the tram purchase list, the rail vehicle purchase list, both, or neither.
